short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser into a vibrant window to the city that never sleeps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Night Skyline Bliss features a stunning view of Hong Kong's illuminated skyscrapers, casting a mesmerizing glow over the harbor. Perfect for night owls and urban enthusiasts, this extension delivers a captivating atmosphere for your browsing experience.

Enjoy a sleek, modern theme that pairs perfectly with the vivid colors of the city lights. Whether you're working late or simply enjoying the night vibe, this extension offers a serene yet energetic ambiance to accompany your online journey.
